suite.name: Catfact Api Tests

kw.name: Create Session
kw.msg: Creating Session using : alias=catfact, url=https://catfact.ninja, headers={}, cookies={}, auth=None, timeout=None, proxies=None, verify=False, debug=0
kw.doc: Create Session: create a HTTP session to a server

kw.name: GET
kw.msg: GET Request : url=https://catfact.ninja/fact path_url=/fact headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.32.3', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive'} body=None

kw.name: Log To Console
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

kw.name: Log To Console
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

kw.name: Log To Console
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

kw.name: Log
kw.msg: {"fact":"One reason that kittens sleep so much is because a growth hormone is released only during sleep.","length":96}
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Set Variable
kw.msg: ${body} = {'fact': 'One reason that kittens sleep so much is because a growth hormone is released only during sleep.', 'length': 96}
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.

kw.name: Dictionary Should Contain Key
kw.doc: Fails if ``key`` is not found from ``dictionary``.

kw.name: Dictionary Should Contain Key
kw.doc: Fails if ``key`` is not found from ``dictionary``.

kw.name: Should Be String
kw.doc: Fails if the given ``item`` is not a string.

kw.name: Should Not Be Empty
kw.doc: Verifies that the given item is not empty.

kw.name: Set Variable
kw.msg: ${fact} = One reason that kittens sleep so much is because a growth hormone is released only during sleep.
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.

kw.name: Evaluate
kw.doc: Evaluates the given expression in Python and returns the result.

kw.name: Should Be Equal As Integers
kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to integers.

suite.doc: Test suite for CatFact API using Robot Framework
